greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of strict factorizations of n using elements of A007916 (numbers that are not perfect powers).
example: The a(72) = 4 factorizations are (2*3*12), (3*24), (6*12), (72). Missing from this list and not strict are (2*2*2*3*3), (2*2*3*6), (2*6*6), (2*2*18), while missing from the list and using perfect powers are (2*36), (2*4*9), (3*4*6), (4*18), (8*9).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 04 2019
